===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=くんばいうちわ'|軍配|tr1=gunbai|t1=army signalling|団扇|tr2=uchiwa|t2=rigid Japanese hand fan}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ぐんばい うちわ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=くんばいうちわ'|sumo}} a [[lacquered]] [[wooden]] [[fan]] used for [[signal]]ing by the {{m|ja|行司|tr=gyōji||sumo referee}}
# {{lb|ja|sort=くんばいうちわ'|warfare}} a [[rigid]] [[fan]] used for [[military]] [[signal]]ing
# a {{m|ja|家紋|tr=kamon||family crest}} featuring a ''gunbai uchiwa'' design
